tests.prompt: Hover over an empty hex during your turn. Verify a path preview highlights the route from current position to hovered hex.
Click an empty hex during your turn. Verify entity moves to that hex and movement remaining decreases.
During your turn, verify a glowing border shows around all reachable hexes based on remaining movement.
Click an enemy within movement+attack range. Verify entity moves to adjacent hex and attacks.
Hover over an enemy during your turn. Verify path shows to adjacent hex and enemy has attack indicator.
Verify a compact turn order strip shows at top of hex grid with current combatant and upcoming turns.
Verify action panel shows End Turn, Backpack, and resources but NOT Move/Attack buttons.
